actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the coastwise laws of the United States to the U.S. Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation in bulk by water of crude oil, unfinished oils, residual fuel oil, and finished petroleum products.

summary.text: Extends the coastwise shipping laws of the United States, with respect to the transportation of crude oil, residential fuel oil, unfinished oils, and finished petroleum products, to the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to extend the coastwise laws of the United States to the U.S. Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation in bulk by water of crude oil, unfinished oils, residual fuel oil, and finished petroleum products.
